name: Ambulance Driver 3d Simulator Games
description:
Ambulance Driver Simulator Game

An emergency has occurred and you have to be on the scene as quick as possible. Take the victims to the hospital. To make sure they get well bring them fast to hospital.
This realistic driving game is for the real driving simulator lovers.
In this realistic 3D ambulance driving game you have to pick up victims of a traffic jam bring them to the hospital, without running out
of time. You will be amazed by the 3D city where you are driving in. Do you enjoy driving simulators?
Rush your van around the city to get to the scene of accident in time. Drive Fast, yet safely, and provide first aid in the state of
emergency.
If you drive in this parking ambulance game do this you can proudly call yourself a real ambulance driver!

Game features:

Easy to control, this makes it fun to play for all ages
- Many different levels of parking and driving, so you will learn everything about driving one of these 3D ambulances
- The driving physics are amazingly realistic
- An amazing 3D city to drive in with your realistic 3D ambulance
